name: Super Mario 64: The Green Comet
overview: It is Super Mario 64, but now the green comet has joined the fray. Explore all these stages you know and love, but now with hidden green stars scattered all over the place. It could be out in the open, but difficult to get to or it could be hidden in a place you don't know about. You will have to use tricks and your skills to collect all 121 green stars. Do you have what it takes?
